definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: Mr Yettaw, who has been ill since his arrest in Burma, wore the mask to guard against infection.
sentences.chinese: 他在緬甸被捕以後，染病戴着口罩是爲了防止感染。

sentences.english: Meteorologists advised the public to wear face masks to ward off dust.
sentences.chinese: 氣象學家建議公衆外出時戴口罩。

sentences.english: You should be wearing a mask.
The second day zhao to wearing a mask to work.
sentences.chinese: 第二天趙來戴着一個口罩上班。

sentences.english: Pet owners should handle with gloves, a mask and consult veterinarians .
sentences.chinese: 照顧生病的動物時應戴上手套及口罩，或獸醫請教。

sentences.english: Pedestrians wear face-masks, some are complaining about the smog.
sentences.chinese: 路上有人帶着口罩，也有人在抱怨煙霧。

sentences.english: Keep mask in my coat pocket, humidifier by my bed.
sentences.chinese: 外套口袋裏備有口罩，牀邊備有空氣加溼器。

sentences.english: Our university is on the north of the city, even so, there are always to wear masks to go out.
sentences.chinese: 我們的大學就在北城，即使這樣，出門也總要戴口罩。

sentences.english: Black list allows you to set masks and exact emails for blocking.
sentences.chinese: 黑名單，讓您可以設定口罩和確切的電子郵件的封鎖。

sentences.english: Presents and gifts blind the eyes of judges, and make them dumb in the mouth, so that they cannot correct.
sentences.chinese: 贈品與禮物昏迷明智人的眼目，就如口罩阻止責斥。

sentences.english: Facemasks and respirators are not recommended in lower exposure risk work environments.
sentences.chinese: 在低暴露風險工作環境不推薦使用口罩和呼吸器。

sentences.english: Universities have made the wearing of masks mandatory.
sentences.chinese: 大學規定所有學生都要戴口罩。

sentences.english: Require all frontline staff to wear surgical gloves and masks.
sentences.chinese: 若衛生局建議，其他員工亦須戴上口罩。

sentences.english: Jiahao technology Co. , Ltd specialized in producing Mask machine and mask production line.
sentences.chinese: 佳好科技有限公司專業生口罩機械和口罩生產線。

sentences.english: Jiahao technology Co. , Ltd specialized in producing Mask machine and mask production line.
sentences.chinese: 佳好科技有限公司專業生口罩機械和口罩生產線。

sentences.english: Transit workers and supermarket employees began wearing masks.
sentences.chinese: 搬運工和超級市場員工開始戴口罩。

definition: to wear a hat/(fig.) to stigmatize/to be branded as
